name: Food Buddy Panic!
description:
My very first game made in Ryans Lil Jam with a very cool team out of two very cool 2D Artists and me as the Programmer

2D Artist:

https://infinitestrike.itch.io/

https://twitter.com/WARBLEHOOT

Controls:

W/A/S/D = Moving

Crafting = Click the NPC on the top with the mouse to craft

Collect items to use them to craft buddys or other stuff at the NPC on the top and to get more points.
